header.title: ICALL (Intelligent Computer-Assisted Language Learning): Research and publications

ul.li: Johnson, Ryan, Lene Antonsen, Trond Trosterud 2013: Using finite state transducers for making efficient reading comprehension dictionaries. Proceedings of the 19th Nordic Conference of Computational Linguistics (NODALIDA 2013), May 22–24, 2013, Oslo University, Norway. NEALT Proceedings Series 16: 59–71.

Antonsen, Lene 2013: Constraints in Free-input Question-Answering Drills. Proceedings of the second workshop on NLP for computer-assisted language learning at NODALIDA 2013, May 22-24, Oslo, Norway. NEALT Proceedings Series 17: 11-26.

Antonsen, Lene, Ryan Johnson, Trond Trosterud, Heli Uibo 2013: Generating modular grammar exercises with finite-state transducers. Proceedings of the second workshop on NLP for computer-assisted language learning at NODALIDA 2013, May 22-24, Oslo, Norway. NEALT Proceedings Series 17: 27-38.

Antonsen, Lene 2013: Samiske læremidler på internett – og UiTs rolle i dette . Presentasjon på seminar for samisklærere arrangert av Utdanningsdirektoratet og Fylkesmannen i Nord-Trøndelag, Nordland, Troms og Finnmark: Vurderingskurs for sensorer for samisk som førstespråk og andrespråk i grunnskolen og videregående skole. Tromsø, 14.–15. februar 2013.

Antonsen, Lene 2012: Improving feedback on L2 misspellings – an FST approach. Proceedings of the SLTC 2012 workshop on NLP for CALL, Lund, 25th October, 2012. Linköping Electronic Conference Proceedings 80: 1-10.
Antonsen, Lene 2012: Online Saami. Presentation at Arbeidsseminar om IT-undervisning i Nordens språk, 23–24.10.12 Lund.
Trosterud, Trond 2012: Investigating morphological complexity by means of ICALL log data. Presentation at Learner Language, Learner Corpora 5–6.10.12 in Oulu.
Antonsen, Lene 2012: Learner corpus from a free-form student response system. Presentation at Learner Language, Learner Corpora 5–6.10.12 in Oulu.

Antonsen, Lene, Ciprian Gerstenberger, Ryan Johnson, Trond Trosterud, Heli Uibo 2012: A modular system for porting advanced interactive programs to new, morphology-rich languages. Presentation at Eurocall 2012, in Göteborg.
Antonsen, Lene, Berit A. B. Baal and Trond Trosterud 2012: Letting ICALL make minority language instruction at university level available over a wide area. Poster made for Eurocall 2012, in Göteborg.

Antonsen, L., Huhmarniemi, S. and T. Trosterud 2009: Interactive pedagogical programs based on constraint grammar. Proceedings of the 17th Nordic Conference of Computational Linguistics. Nealt Proceedings Series 4.
Antonsen, Lene, Saara Huhmarniemi and Trond Trosterud 2009: Constraint Grammar in Dialogue Systems. NEALT Proceedings Series 2009. Volum 8. s. 13–21.

Antonsen, L., Baal, B. Á. B., Huhumarniemi, S., Trosterud, T. 2009: Dihtor ja giela válljenvejolašvuođat – gielalaš ja pedagogalaš čuolmmat. (The Computer and the Variability of Language – Linguistic and Pedagogical Issues). – Johanna Ijäs – Nils Øivind Helander (doaim.), Sáhkavuoruin sáhkan. Sámegiela ja sámi girjjálašvuođa muhtin áigeguovdilis dutkanfáttát s. 87–102. Dieđut 1/2009. Guovdageaidnu: Sámi allaskuvla.

Voestes Digibaakoeh: Ordboka forstår bøyde ord. Poster about South Saami dictionary – for the language communities. Made for Gïeleviermie conference in Røros, 19–20.10.11
Interactive Pedagogical Programs Based on Constraint Grammar. Poster made for NODALIDA conference 16.05 2009 Odense.
Vuosttaš Digisánit: Ordboka forstår bøyde ord. Poster made for Forskningsdagene 2009.
Antonsen, L., Gerstenberger, C, Moshagen, S., Trosterud, T. 2009: Ei intelligent elektronisk ordbok for samisk. LexicoNordica Volum 16 s. 271–283. Oslo: Nordisk forening for leksikografi.
Lær samisk med språkteknologi. Poster made for Forskningsdagene 2009.
